newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle trade steady $113/dressed - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle trade steady $113/dressed - USDA.

text.p: with a few sales slaughter steers and heifers steady, USDA said. Buyer inquiry and demand fairly good. Seller interest mixed. On a dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights) steers and heifers were steady.
Dressed Basis Steers- Select and Choice 2-3 1250-1325 lbs 113.00. Dressed Basis Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 113.00.
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1250-1350 lbs 70.00-71.00. Slaughter Heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 70.00. Confirmed - 1,400 For the week - 51,000
